TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to click on run Standard Report.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify user is able to click on run button in Standard Report.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on run button in Standard Report.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on run button in Standard Report.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on run button in Standard Report.
